qas.question: When was the Charles Cross car park removed?
In what month and year was the grand opening of Drake Circus Shopping Centre?
What prize did TR2 almost win?

answers.text: the RIBA Stirling Prize for Architecture in 2003

qas.question: Who spoke disparagingly about the Drake Circus Shopping Centre?

context: In <a0_0>2004<a0_0/> the old Drake Circus shopping centre and Charles Cross car park were demolished and replaced by the latest Drake Circus Shopping Centre, which opened in <a1_0>October 2006<a1_0/>. It received negative feedback before opening when <a4_0>David Mackay<a4_0/> said it was already "ten years out of date". In contrast, the Theatre Royal's production and education centre, TR2, which was built on wasteland at <a2_0>Cattedown<a2_0/>, was a runner-up for <a3_0>the RIBA Stirling Prize for Architecture in 2003<a3_0/>.
